recipes.name: Barbeque Chicken
recipes.synopsis: Chicken slow cooked on the grill and poured with barbeque sauce
recipes.author: tgoandrex
instructions: Remove unthawed chicken from package, season if desired
Place chicken on grill and cook for 40 minutes, cook for longer if blood is present inside
Pour barbeque sauce on grilled chicken and cool for 5 minutes

recipes.name: Spaghetti
recipes.synopsis: Spaghetti covered in sauce and meatballs
recipes.author: pastaguy
instructions: Pour sauce and seasonings into large container and mix
Remove unthawed meatballs in package and cook in oven for 10-15 minutes at 350 degrees
Remove meatballs and place in sauce container, cook on stove on low-medium setting for 50 minutes, check and stir occasionally
Remove noodles from package and cook on stove on high for 20 minutes. Recommend starting this 20 minutes before sauce is finished for best results
Allow both sauce and noodles to cool for 5 minutes
Eat and enjoy, add parmesan cheese to dish if desired

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.synopsis: Homemade pancakes cooked until golden brown, with maple syrup
recipes.author: xxRecipeFanxx
instructions: Get a cup of flour, 2 tablespoons of sugar and baking powder, and 1 teaspoon of salt. Mix thoroughly in a bowl for 2 minutes
Pour 1 cup of milk, 1 beaten egg, and 2 tablespoons of cooking oil into the mix and mix a second time for 3 minutes until smooth
Heat a lightly oiled frying pan on a stove at medium-high and pour a quarter of the pancake mix, cook until both sides are golden brown
Repeat the previous step 3 more times for the rest of the mix
Wait until all are cooled for 5 minutes, pour maple syrup if desired
